scripts.?docs:dev: run a vite dev server for the docs using the ui package
scripts.?play: run a vite playground with the built ui package to mimic real usage
scripts.play: pnpm --filter ui build && pnpm --filter playground dev
scripts.?new-component: create a new component and page for it in the docs
scripts.?new-composable: create a new composable and page for it in the docs
scripts.?lint:fix: fix linting errors throughout the project
